entity.name: The White House
entity.description: Conversation from and about the White House, both as a destination and as political voice

text: @WhiteHouse @realDonaldTrump You're a LAZY LITTLE HANDED LIAR!!👐We are ALL grateful to the Army Corps of Engineers, the Navy, the DOCTORS from the COVID-19 Team...and many more!! We are just NOT grateful to YOU!! There's NOTHING to be grateful to you for!! You cheated us and let us down!! So fuck off!!😤
